meta.keywords: ajirna syrup, digestion medicine, anorexia, apetite, ayurvedic
meta.description: Ajirna Syrup is an Ayurvedic solution to all your digestion related problem. It stimulates the digestive enzymes and increases the secretion of bile by correcting pancreatic insufficiency, and helps in digestion of food
